Description.Text: Admiral Arena Hotel is a modern 4-star property offering comfortable accommodation near the heart of Belgrade. Highlights include free Wi-Fi, onsite dining and a great location opposite the Admiral Arena. Belgrade is an ancient city found at the confluence of the Danube and the Sava rivers, a location that has been settled since prehistoric times. Places of interest include historic Skadarlija, the Belgrade Fortress, the Cathedral of Saint Sava, the Nikola Tesla Museum and the modern business district, Novi Beograd. Local tram, bus and rail services provide fast and easy access to other popular Belgrade destinations. The hotel is housed in a 21st-century low-rise building with a glass facade. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are decorated in a bright, modern style with wood furniture, carpeted floors and high ceilings. Amenities include air-conditioning, a flat-screen satellite TV, mini-bar, safe and work desk. The en-suite bathrooms feature a walk-in shower. The hotel restaurant serves Serbian specialities and international cuisine in a relaxed setting, and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel has a 24-hour reception.
